name: 达尼罗 -巴塔-斯托科维奇 Danilo 'Bata' Stojkovic
intro: Danilo Stojković (Serbian Cyrillic: Данило Стојковић) (August 11, 1934 - March 16, 2002), commonly nicknamed Bata (Бата), was a Serbian theatre, television and film actor. Stojković's numerous comedic portrayals of the "small man fighting the system" made him popular with Serbian and ex-Yugoslav audiences, most of them coming in collaborations with either director Slobodan Šijan or scriptwriter Dušan Kovačević - or both. http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Danilo_Bata_Stojkovi%C4%87
birthplace: 南斯拉夫,塞尔维亚,贝尔格莱德
